title: Another World Is Full of Happiness (Template) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Age Regression   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Cheats   Child Protagonist   God-human Relationship   Goddesses   Lack of Common Sense   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Naive Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Parody   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transported to Another World

description:
A God met Ryoji Uchino on a different path and asked him to go to another world. He told me in a cheerful manner. It was a trip to the other world with the help of the convenience of a cheats. . Ryoji was prepared for the days of hardship that await him, but....

The other world was full of happiness (templates).

It's a slapstick drama for Ryoji, who is surrounded by templates✧>
